instruction

Interface InstructionStatusOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownISO, InstructionStatus, LeftISO, RightISO, StopISO, UpISO

    public interface InstructionStatusOperations
    The defined operations for an instruction status. This interface defines state transitions. Contains default implementations of state transitions.
    Author:
    heshamsalman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default InstructionStatus down(Instruction instruction)
      Switches state to DOWN
      default InstructionStatus left(Instruction instruction)
      Switches state to LEFT
      default InstructionStatus right(Instruction instruction)
      Switches state to RIGHT
      default InstructionStatus stop(Instruction instruction)
      Switches state to STOP
      default InstructionStatus up(Instruction instruction)
      Switches state to UP

    • Method Detail

      • left

        default InstructionStatus left(Instruction instruction)
                        throws UnsupportedStatusTransitionException
        Switches state to LEFT
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction to switch
        Returns:
        InstructionStatus.LEFT
        Throws:
        UnsupportedStatusTransitionException - won't allow instructions to change states to themselves.

      • right

        default InstructionStatus right(Instruction instruction)
                         throws UnsupportedStatusTransitionException
        Switches state to RIGHT
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction to switch
        Returns:
        InstructionStatus.RIGHT
        Throws:
        UnsupportedStatusTransitionException - won't allow instructions to change states to themselves.

        Returns:
